description: A butter chicken with a twist that is sure to please. You can adjust the chilli for the little ones.
name: Indian Butter Chicken Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Bring it to a gentle simmer & add your butter. Cook a further few minutes until your sauce is nice & glossy.
